definition: sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable/item sold at a loss
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Instead, he fell victim to his faith in the anti-fat propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 很可惜，他成了“反对脂肪”宣传的牺牲品。

sentences.english: My friend was a victim of hit-and-run.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友是一个撞了人就跑绰了的牺牲品。

sentences.english: Afternoon newspapers were the first casualties.
"- the people's victim and life-long bond-slave, as they fancied her, might say to them.
sentences.chinese: 人们心目中的这个牺牲品和终身奴仆会对他们这样说。

sentences.english: Yet they persist in seeing themselves as victims of daddy's job.
sentences.chinese: 然而，她们还是坚持认为自己是父亲事业的牺牲品。

sentences.english: An intricate trap that entangles or ensnares its victim.
sentences.chinese: 缠上或诱捕它的牺牲品的复杂的捕捉机。

sentences.english: He's been sacrificed to the Puritan cause.
sentences.chinese: 他成了新兴清教徒事业的牺牲品。

sentences.english: But they would not forget the sacrificial and paschal aspect of the Supper.
sentences.chinese: 但他们不会忘记的牺牲品，并逾越方面的晚饭。

sentences.english: We are not all equally likely to fall prey.
sentences.chinese: 我们沦为牺牲品的可能性不尽相同。

sentences.english: There was no more poignant victim of it than Marilyn Monroe.
sentences.chinese: 而玛丽莲梦露便是此种错误最惨烈的牺牲品。

sentences.english: IF YOU tolerate this, your children will be next.
sentences.chinese: 你若姑息此事，你的孩子将是下一个牺牲品。
他是连带被株连的牺牲品。

sentences.english: Politicians and media bloviators will be vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 政治家和媒体人员将成为牺牲品。

sentences.english: The lads don't join the union because they're frightened of being victimized.
sentences.chinese: 那几个伙计没加入工会是因为害怕成为牺牲品。

sentences.english: Audley, and do you select me as the victim of your monomania?
sentences.chinese: 难道你选定我作你那躁狂症的牺牲品吗？

sentences.english: Moreover, the side in-between would be the severest victim in the battle of love, embarrassed in making any perspective choice.
sentences.chinese: 再者，局中人将成为爱情战争最严重的牺牲品。

definition: sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
lit. target of a multitude of arrows (idiom); the butt of public criticism/attacked on all sides
variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
to sink down to/to be reduced to (sth inferior)
a matter for ridicule/an object of ridicule/laughingstock
to be drawn into/to be involved in
stepping stone/fig. person used to advance one's career
stumbling block/obstacle/someone who gets in your way
